segments.text: Is there someone I can talk to about a payment question ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we can handle that here . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My paycheck that just arrived is less than last week ’ s check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you work at all during the last pay period ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , actually , I did make a little bit of money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you report it on your Continued Claim Form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I showed that income on the Continued Claim Form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we deducted a portion of the income that you made from this week ’ s check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I just shouldn ’ t show the income then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is cheating and , if you get caught , you will be fined and disqualified from collecting unemployment .
segments.speaker: S2
